articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday night's EFL Cup second-round action, including wins for Fulham over Tottenham and Salford City against Leeds, plus transfers latest.
articles.title: EFL Cup reaction, football news & transfers latest

articles.description: England's men and women will receive the same money in match fees for internationals with immediate effect.
articles.title: England men and women to be paid same match fees

articles.description: Bryan Habana and Matt Dawson have chosen their top 10 Rugby World Cup moments - and you can do the same.
articles.title: Rank the top 10 Rugby World Cup moments

articles.description: Chelsea and England forward Lauren James says she feels "privileged" to win the PFA women's young player of the year award.
articles.title: James feels 'privileged' to win PFA young player award

articles.description: Chelsea are interested in signing Manchester City forward Cole Palmer before Friday's transfer deadline.
articles.title: Chelsea interested in signing Man City forward Palmer

articles.description: Tennis gets its first experience of a video-assist review system at the US Open - but it is labelled a 'farce' by Andy Murray after the technology malfunctions.
articles.title: 'It's not working' - VAR 'farce' on US Open debut

articles.description: In 2017, Dani Czernuszka-Watts was paralysed in a "reckless" rugby tackle. Nearly six years on, she is playing Para-ice hockey for Great Britain.
articles.title: 'Freedom' on ice after being paralysed on rugby pitch

articles.description: Following a record-equalling World Athletics Championships, a buoyant British team considered driving back from Budapest after being stranded by flight cancellations.
articles.title: 'We looked at driving back' - GB athletes stuck in Budapest

articles.description: Matt Fitzpatrick and Robert MacIntyre are among those playing this weekend in a bid to secure the final two automatic qualifying spots on Europe's Ryder Cup team.
articles.title: Who needs what for European Ryder Cup qualification?

articles.description: Wales recall Tom Lockyer for games against South Korea and Latvia following the Luton Town captain's recovery from heart surgery.
articles.title: Wales recall Luton's Lockyer after heart surgery
